answers.answer: Most doctors won't do another ultrasound till about 15-20 weeks. That's when they will do the anatomy ultrasound. I never had the diabetes so I can't say if that changes when you get the ultrasound they normally do a blood test at 16 weeks for diabetes then again at 28 weeks an if either come back abnormal they will have you do a 3 hour blood test.  Wish you the best of luck an welcome to the club haha
Thank you! Were you able to get copies of the ultrasound at the anatomy u/s visit? Do you have to ask them for it?
No you don't have to ask they always give you pictures to take home they will even make extra copies if you bring guests
